thread.section_title: Nerva Boutique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect start to a great vacation
thread.title_full: Perfect start to a great vacation - Review of Nerva Boutique Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: _destinationhop
title: Perfect start to a great vacation
text: Nerva Boutique Hotel is centrally located in Rome, most places to visit are within walking distance or a short cab ride. The hotel was very clean and staff was very welcoming. We had breakfast in the cafe downstairs. Staying at the Nerva Boutique was a perfect start to a great vacation, I will stay here again.
